verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> So the king וְהָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> and Haman לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to banquet עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶסְתֵּ֥ר <S%H635><s%> with Esther הַמַּלְכָּֽה׃ <S%H4436><s%> the queen

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֜ר <S%H635><s%> again unto Esther גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> on the second בְּמִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> at the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What שְּׁאֵלָתֵ֛ךְ <S%H7596><s%> What [is] thy petition אֶסְתֵּ֥ר <S%H635><s%> to Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4436><s%> queen וְתִנָּ֣תֵֽן <S%H5414><s%> add לָ֑ךְ וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <S%H1246><s%> request עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> [even] to the half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom וְתֵעָֽשׂ׃ <S%H6213><s%> shall be done

וַתַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אֶסְתֵּ֤ר <S%H635><s%> Then Esther הַמַּלְכָּה֙ <S%H4436><s%> the queen וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> If I have found חֵ֤ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king ט֑וֹב <S%H2895><s%> and if it please תִּנָּֽתֶן־ <S%H5414><s%> be given לִ֤י נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> let my life בִּשְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <S%H7596><s%> me at my petition וְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> and my people בְּבַקָּשָׁתִֽי׃ <S%H1246><s%> at my request

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְכַּ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H4376><s%> For we are sold אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and וְעַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> I and my people לְהַשְׁמִ֖יד <S%H8045><s%> to be destroyed לַהֲר֣וֹג <S%H2026><s%> to be slain וּלְאַבֵּ֑ד <S%H6><s%> and to perish וְ֠אִלּוּ <S%H432><s%> But if לַעֲבָדִ֨ים <S%H5650><s%> for bondmen וְלִשְׁפָח֤וֹת <S%H8198><s%> and bondwomen נִמְכַּ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H4376><s%> we had been sold הֶחֱרַ֔שְׁתִּי <S%H2790><s%> I had held my tongue כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> for הַצָּ֛ר <S%H6862><s%> although the enemy שֹׁוֶ֖ה <S%H7737><s%> could not countervail בְּנֵ֥זֶק <S%H5143><s%> damage הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king's ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> answered הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is he וְאֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> and where זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> he ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> is he אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who מְלָא֥וֹ <S%H4390><s%> Who is he and where is he that durst presume לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> And Esther אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a צַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> foe וְאוֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> and enemy הָמָ֥ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [is] this wicked הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> is this וְהָמָ֣ן <S%H2001><s%> Then Haman נִבְעַ֔ת <S%H1204><s%> was afraid מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְהַמַּלְכָּֽה׃ <S%H4436><s%> and the queen

וְהַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king קָ֤ם <S%H6965><s%> arising בַּחֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H2534><s%> in his wrath מִמִּשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> from the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against גִּנַּ֖ת <S%H1594><s%> garden הַבִּיתָ֑ן <S%H1055><s%> [went] into the palace וְהָמָ֣ן <S%H2001><s%> and Haman עָמַ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> stood up לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to make request עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> for his life מֵֽאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> to Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָאָ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> for he saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלְתָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> determined אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> against הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> that there was evil מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H854><s%> by הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> against him by the king

וְהַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king שָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> returned מִגִּנַּ֨ת <S%H1594><s%> garden הַבִּיתָ֜ן <S%H1055><s%> out of the palace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּ֣ית ׀ <S%H1004><s%> into the place מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> of the banquet הַיַּ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine וְהָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> and Haman נֹפֵ֔ל <S%H5307><s%> was fallen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּטָּה֙ <S%H4296><s%> upon the bed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H635><s%> whereon Esther עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [was] Then said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הֲ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> even לִכְבּ֧וֹשׁ <S%H3533><s%> Will he force אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְכָּ֛ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> into בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> the place הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> act יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> went out מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> face הָמָ֖ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman's חָפֽוּ׃ <S%H2645><s%> they covered ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חַ֠רְבוֹנָה <S%H2726><s%> And Harbonah אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַסָּרִיסִ֜ים <S%H5631><s%> of the chamberlains לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> indeed הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> Behold also the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֪ה <S%H6213><s%> had made הָמָ֟ן <S%H2001><s%> which Haman לְֽמָרְדֳּכַ֞י <S%H4782><s%> for Mordecai אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> who had spoken ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king עֹמֵד֙ <S%H5975><s%> standeth בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> of Haman גָּבֹ֖הַּ <S%H1364><s%> high חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king תְּלֻ֥הוּ <S%H8518><s%> Hang עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> behalf

וַיִּתְלוּ֙ <S%H8518><s%> So they hanged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> on the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> that he had prepared לְמָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> for Mordecai וַחֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> wrath הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then was the king's שָׁכָֽכָה׃ <S%H7918><s%> pacified פ
